CPS 2 Information

The CP system 2 or the Capcom Play System 2 is a recreational machine in motherboard system that appeared in 1993 together with the Super Street Fighter 2 game. CPS-2 is composed of 2 different parts, the first one which was a plate A connected to JAMMA harness and holds the common parts of all the CPS-S games. The second part is the B board that carries the playoffs. The connection between the two is that they are both cartridges and home console. The CPS-2 systems plate A and B are recognized by the color codes per region, and each of the board can be used only one same color.

The plate B has a support battery memory which carries the decryption code that is needed to start the games. In addition to that, these batteries forget their loads and the games doesn't respond. They named this by the connoisseurs to be "Suicide CPS".

There are various emulators that imitate this system, for example, the MAME and other different adaptations.

At Retrostic, you can download and play Capcom Play System 2 ROMs for free. We provide you the full list of retro CPS2 games just that can be downloaded or played online. A few of the best titles include Hyper Street Fighter II: The Anniversary Edition, Marvel Versus Capcom - Clash Of Super Heroes, Alien Versus Predator and X-Men Versus Street Fighter.

We are dedicated to archiving the retro Capcom games so there is no doubt that we hold the full CPS 2 ROMs database.
